ComicInfo.Title: Heart of Glass
ComicInfo.Summary: The all-new continuing Tick series continues with a second smash issue! A new super-villainess is is giving The Tick a 'run for his money' across the length and breadth of The City after stealing a super-powered 'mystery object.' Â Plus, Chairface attempts to from the 'prison with prison' in which he has been incarcerated, due to his many previous escape attempts!
